TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SerialData extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of character that was received on the serial port of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived> event. You examine the type of character that was received by retrieving the value of the eceivedEventArgs.EventType property of the eceivedEventArgs class. The eceivedEventArgs.EventType property contains one of the values from the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialDataReceivedEventArgs.EventType%2A> enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Ports.SerialData Chars = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A character was received and placed in the input buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Ports.SerialData Eof = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The end of file character was received and placed in the input buffer.
